SELECT tb.BRDNO as BRDNO, tb.BRDTITLE as BRDTITLE, cu.USERNO as USERNO, cu.USERNM as USERNM, tb.BRDMEMO as BRDMEMO, tb.BRDDATE as BRDDATE, tb.HIT as HIT FROM TBL_BOARD tb INNER JOIN COM_USER cu ON tb.USERNO = cu.USERNO
AND tb.BGNO =#{bgno} AND tb.BRDDELETEFLAG = 'N'
AND (MATCH(tb.BRDTITLE) AGAINST (#{keyword} IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE) OR MATCH(cu.USERNM) AGAINST (#{keyword} IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE))
ORDER BY tb.BRDDATE DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT tb.BRDNO, tb.BRDTITLE, cu.USERID, cu.USERNM, tb.BRDMEMO, tb.BRDDATE, tb.HIT FROM TBL_BOARD tb INNER JOIN COM_USER cu ON tb.USERNO = cu.USERNO
AND tb.BRDNO = #{brdno} AND tb.BRDDELETEFLAG = 'N'
